metadata.title: CVE-2022-3628 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A buffer overflow flaw was found in the Linux kernel Broadcom Full MACWi-Fi driver. This issue occurs when a user connects to a malicious USBdevice. This can allow a local user to crash the system or escalate theirprivileges.
